org.pojava.transformation

Class BindingAdaptor<I,O>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.pojava.transformation.BindingAdaptor<I,O>
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BooleanIntegerAdaptor, BooleanYNAdaptor

    public abstract class BindingAdaptor<I,O>
extends Object
    A BindingAdaptor is a two-way data transformer used for translating a single typed value with an external representation.

    It is responsible for translating both the data and the expected class in both directions, even for null values.

    Author:
    John Pile
